      • addBlock

        public void addBlock(Class<? extends Block> blockClass)
              throws EngineExceptions.UnknowBlockClass,
                     InstantiationException,
                     IllegalAccessException
        Add a new block to the engine
        Parameters:
        blockClass - the class to create the object from
        Throws:
        EngineExceptions.UnknowBlockClass - if the class definition is unknown
        InstantiationException - if instanciation goes wrong.
        IllegalAccessException - if instanciation goes wrong.
